job_description:
Functional Consultant Jr/Trainee - SAP Business One [Fresher - 2 years]

Role: Assist SAP B1 implementations, covering requirements gathering, basic configuration, DTW data upload, User Acceptance Testing (UAT), end-user training, and post-go-live support.

Responsibilities: - Map business processes for Sales, Purchase, Inventory, and Finance modules. - Prepare Business Requirement Documents (BRD) and Functional Requirement Documents (FRD). - Develop test cases and user documentation. - Configure User Defined Fields (UDF) and User Defined Tables (UDT). - Set up approval procedures and user authorizations. - Run simple reports using Query Generator and basic Crystal Reports.

Requirements: - Educational Background: B.Com/BBA/MBA (Finance/Operations) or BE/B.Tech. - Skills: Proficiency in Excel, strong documentation skills, and clear communication abilities. - Knowledge: Basic understanding of GST and accounting principles (Accounts Payable/Accounts Receivable/Cost of Goods Sold). - Preferred Qualifications (Nice to have): Prior exposure to SAP Business One or SQL-HANA (training will be provided for these areas).

How to Apply: Please email your resume to operations@nasinfosolutions.com with the subject line 'Jr/Trainee – SAP B1'. If this opportunity aligns with your career goals, kindly share your updated resume with us at operations@nasinfosolutions.com.
summary: Jr/Trainee role assisting SAP B1 implementations. Responsibilities include configuration, data upload, UAT, and training. Requires B.Com/BBA/MBA or BE/B.Tech with Excel and accounting basics.

job_description:
Sr. Marketing Executive

Company: ECESIS CARE (P) Ltd Location: 4th FLOOR, M SQUARED BUILDING, ANNEX 2, TECHNOPARK CAMPUS, KARIYAVATTOM, TRIVANDRUM, KERALA, 695581 Website: https://www.ecesistech.com

Job Published: 18, Oct 2025 Closing Date: 23, Oct 2025

Brief Description

We are seeking a highly motivated and ambitious Marketing Executive with 1 to 3 years of experience to join our team. The ideal candidate is a proactive individual who is not just looking for a job, but a career-defining opportunity. This is a high-impact role where you will report directly to senior management, working as a key individual contributor with the unique opportunity to create and lead our marketing team as we grow.

You will be instrumental in driving our marketing initiatives, taking on significant responsibilities, and tackling the exciting challenges of exponential business growth. This role offers a chance to work in a vibrant, cross-cultural environment, crafting and executing strategies for a global audience with a special focus on the Japanese market.

Requirements:

Qualifications:

  • Education: A bachelor’s degree in any field with a Master’s degree in marketing, Business Administration, Communications, or a related field.
  • Experience: 1-3 years of proven experience in a B2B marketing role, preferably within the Technology, SaaS, or IT Services industry.

Key Responsibilities

  • Strategy & Execution: Assist in developing and implementing comprehensive B2B marketing strategies to increase brand awareness, drive lead generation, and support sales objectives.
  • Digital Marketing: Manage and execute campaigns across various digital channels including SEO/SEM, email marketing, social media (especially LinkedIn), and content marketing.
  • Content Creation: Develop compelling marketing collateral such as blog posts, case studies, whitepapers, social media updates, and website content tailored to a global B2B audience.
  • Japan Market Focus:
    • Conduct market research to understand the nuances, trends, and competitive landscape of the Japanese market.
    • Adapt and localize marketing campaigns and materials to resonate with Japanese business culture and audience preferences.
    • Collaborate with the sales team to generate market-specific leads and support their outreach efforts in Japan.
  • Analytics & Reporting: Monitor, analyze, and report on the performance of marketing campaigns using tools like Google Analytics, CRM dashboards, and other analytics platforms. Use data-driven insights to optimize future strategies.
  • Collaboration: Work closely with cross-functional teams, including sales, product development, and technical experts, to ensure a cohesive and effective marketing approach.
  • Lead Nurturing: Manage marketing automation platforms to nurture leads through the sales funnel, ensuring a smooth transition from marketing-qualified leads (MQLs) to sales-qualified leads (SQLs).

Preferred Skills

Must-Have Skills:

  • Digital Marketing Proficiency: Strong, hands-on knowledge of core digital marketing concepts and tools, including:
    • SEO/SEM (Google Ads, keyword research)
    • Social Media Marketing (LinkedIn, etc.)
    • Email Marketing & Automation (e.g., HubSpot, Marketo, Mailchimp)
    • Content Management Systems (e.g., WordPress)
  • Content & Communication: Excellent written and verbal communication skills in English, with a flair for creating engaging and professional B2B content.
  • Analytical Mindset: Ability to analyze data, interpret metrics, and make data-driven decisions. Experience with Google Analytics is essential.
  • Proactive & Ownership Attitude: A self-starter with a strong sense of ownership, eager to take on new challenges and bigger responsibilities.
  • Adaptability: Ability to thrive in a fast-paced, high-growth, and multicultural work environment.

Highly Desirable Skills (Brownie Points):

  • Japanese Market Exposure: Prior experience in marketing to or working with the Japanese market is a significant advantage.
  • Cultural Acumen: Familiarity with Japanese business culture, etiquette, and communication styles.
  • Language Skills: Proficiency in the Japanese language (reading, writing, and/or speaking) is a major plus but not a mandatory requirement.
  • CRM Experience: Hands-on experience with CRM software like Salesforce or Zoho CRM.
  • Tech Savvy: A genuine interest in technology and the ability to grasp complex technical concepts and translate them into marketing messages.

Benefits

  • A competitive salary and benefits package.
  • High visibility and direct mentorship, reporting directly to senior leadership.
  • A clear career path from a foundational individual contributor to a team leader.
  • The opportunity to take ownership of key marketing functions and make a real impact.
  • Direct exposure to international business strategy and operations.
  • A collaborative, supportive, and dynamic work culture.

How to Apply:

Interested candidates can send their updated resume to amrithas@ecesistech.com with the subject line: "Application for Sr. Marketing Executive".
summary: Seeking a Marketing Executive with 1-3 years of B2B experience to drive global marketing strategies. This role offers career growth and focuses on the Japanese market.
